text: Marina Malfatti (25 April 1933 â€“ 8 June 2016) was an Italian actress. She was born in Florence, Italy. She was known for her roles in The Night Evelyn Came Out of the Grave, The Red Queen Kills Seven Times, and in Black Killer. Malfatti died on 8 June 2016 in Rome, Italy, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Florence Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors
title: Marina Malfatti
